<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do a preorder traversal of the CFG starting from the BB |Start|.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// point. Calls |op| on each basic block encountered during the traversal.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-spirvstructurizer-cpp-/#a52f192b099a610d4a5c4b203bd9b46bb"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/spirv/spirvpostlegalizer-cpp/#a090736355958192cac4db32336c48bbd">visit</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &amp;Start, std::function&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;)&gt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagonbittracker-cpp/#a0ee73ba17c3a2cb54752905e99d77357">op</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::stack&lt;BasicBlock &#42;&gt; ToVisit;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 8&gt;</a> Seen;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ToVisit.push(&amp;Start);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Seen.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrsetimpl/#a9d834ae3da8c62c2b668dada51335eb0">insert</a>(ToVisit.top());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ToVisit.size() != 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB = ToVisit.top();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ToVisit.pop();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Replaces the conditional and unconditional branch targets of |BB| by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// |NewTarget| if the target was |OldTarget|. This function also makes sure the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// associated merge instruction gets updated accordingly.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-spirvstructurizer-cpp-/#a55f5674c6ed1c3e224388d258b79fcc5"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-spirvstructurizer-cpp-/#a55f5674c6ed1c3e224388d258b79fcc5">replaceIfBranchTargets</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;OldTarget,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">                            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;NewTarget) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;BI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;BranchInst&gt;</a>(BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#aef9e9fcf4c5dfce90276ca16d91b8e46">getTerminator</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1 Replace all matching successors.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i &lt; BI-&gt;getNumSuccessors(); i++) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BI-&gt;getSuccessor(i) == OldTarget)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlight">      BI-&gt;setSuccessor(i, NewTarget);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Branch was unconditional, no fixup required.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BI-&gt;isUnconditional())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Branch had 2 successors, maybe now both are the same?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BI-&gt;getSuccessor(0) != BI-&gt;getSuccessor(1))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note: we may end up here because the original IR had such branches.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This means Target is not necessarily equal to NewTarget.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> Builder(BB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#ace45cae6925c65e9d6916e09dd5b17cc">SetInsertPoint</a>(BI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#abab736a0141f903dc32a6f48828ad908">CreateBr</a>(BI-&gt;getSuccessor(0));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">  BI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#a601ee49a4c4e0babf29bd1cf09036570">eraseFromParent</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The branch was the only instruction, nothing else to do.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#ab9f68be0e2bcdf14f503f45edea63023">size</a>() == 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, we need to check: was there an OpSelectionMerge before this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// branch? If we removed the OpBranchConditional, we must also remove the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// OpSelectionMerge. This is not valid for OpLoopMerge:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/intrinsicinst">IntrinsicInst</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a> =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;IntrinsicInst&gt;</a>(BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#aef9e9fcf4c5dfce90276ca16d91b8e46">getTerminator</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-node-with-parent/#a1dfdcf6998ec28bfd2f8d2cdebc984a9">getPrevNode</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a> || <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a>-&gt;getIntrinsicID() != Intrinsic::spv&#95;selection&#95;merge)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">Constant</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;Constant&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a>-&gt;getOperand(0));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvvmintrrange-cpp/#ac5804672fc0850438d63caec770647f8">II</a>-&gt;eraseFromParent();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>-&gt;isConstantUsed())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>-&gt;destroyConstant();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Replaces the target of branch instruction in |BB| with |NewTarget| if it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// was |OldTarget|. This function also fixes the associated merge instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note: this function does not simplify branching instructions, it only updates</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// targets. See also: simplifyBranches.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See SPIR-V 2.11.2. Structured Control-flow Constructs for the list of</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Represents a divergent construct in the SPIR-V sense.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Such constructs are represented by a header (entry), a merge block (exit),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and possibly a continue block (back-edge). A construct can contain other</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DT.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortreebase/#a5d344fb542e2d57c633f0161e3a6b231">dominates</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/r600clausemergepass-cpp/#aba99928790de45fa7aa12b47fbd828ff">Merge</a>, BB) || BB == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/r600clausemergepass-cpp/#aba99928790de45fa7aa12b47fbd828ff">Merge</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Output.push&#95;back(BB);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Splits the given edges by recreating proxy nodes so that the destination</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// has unique incoming edges from this region.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// clang-format off</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In SPIR-V, constructs must have a single exit/merge.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Given nodes A and B in the construct, a node C outside, and the following edges.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  A -&gt; C</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  B -&gt; C</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In such cases, we must create a new exit node D, that belong to the construct to make is viable:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A -&gt; D -&gt; C</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// B -&gt; D -&gt; C</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is fine (assuming C has no PHI nodes), but requires handling the merge instruction here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// By adding a proxy node, we create a regular divergent shape which can easily be regularized later on.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A -&gt; D -&gt; D1 -&gt; C</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// B -&gt; D -&gt; D2 -&gt; C</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A, B, D belongs to the construct. D is the exit. D1 and D2 are empty.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// clang-format on</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::vector&lt;Edge&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><span class="doxyHighlight">    createAliasBlocksForComplexEdges(std::vector&lt;Edge&gt; Edges) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::unordered&#95;set&lt;BasicBlock &#42;&gt; Seen;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::vector&lt;Edge&gt; Output;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Output.reserve(Edges.size());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;&#91;Src, Dst&#93; : Edges) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#91;Iterator, Inserted&#93; = Seen.insert(Src);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Inserted) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Src already a source node. Cannot have 2 edges from A to B.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Creating alias source block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;NewSrc = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a4a5b798214be930cf8e133c032ba0129">BasicBlock::Create</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><span class="doxyHighlight">              <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>.getContext(), Src-&gt;getName() + </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;.new.src&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><span class="doxyHighlight">          replaceBranchTargets(Src, Dst, NewSrc);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Src = NewSrc;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Output.emplace&#95;back(Src, Dst);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we can avoid an OpSwitch, generate an OpBranch. Reason is some</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="851"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Fixup the construct |Node| to respect a set of rules defined by the SPIR-V</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="853"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> fixupConstruct(Splitter &amp;S, DivergentConstruct &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="854"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopdeletion-cpp/#a0f1c83c3d08d80b12c424962a5e94ce8a35e0c8c0b180c95d4e122e55ed62cc64">Modified</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="855"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Child : <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>-&gt;Children)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="856"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopdeletion-cpp/#a0f1c83c3d08d80b12c424962a5e94ce8a35e0c8c0b180c95d4e122e55ed62cc64">Modified</a> |= fixupConstruct(S, Child.get());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="857"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="858"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This construct is the root construct. Does not represent any real</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="859"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// construct, just a way to access the first level of the forest.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="860"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>-&gt;Parent == </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="861"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopdeletion-cpp/#a0f1c83c3d08d80b12c424962a5e94ce8a35e0c8c0b180c95d4e122e55ed62cc64">Modified</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="862"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="863"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This node&#39;s parent is the root. Meaning this is a top-level construct.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="864"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There can be multiple exists, but all are guaranteed to exit at most 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="865"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// construct since we are at first level.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="866"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>-&gt;Parent-&gt;Header == </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="867"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopdeletion-cpp/#a0f1c83c3d08d80b12c424962a5e94ce8a35e0c8c0b180c95d4e122e55ed62cc64">Modified</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="868"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="869"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Health check for the structure.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="870"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>-&gt;Header &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>-&gt;Merge);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="873"><span class="doxyHighlight">    BlockSet ConstructBlocks = getConstructBlocks(S, <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="874"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Edges = getExitsFrom(ConstructBlocks, &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>-&gt;Header);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="875"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="876"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  No edges exiting the construct.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="877"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Edges.size() &lt; 1)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="879"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="880"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HasBadEdge = <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>-&gt;Merge == <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>-&gt;Parent-&gt;Merge ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="881"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>-&gt;Merge == <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>-&gt;Parent-&gt;Continue;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="882"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// BasicBlock &#42;Target = Edges&#91;0&#93;.second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="883"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;&#91;Src, Dst&#93; : Edges) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="884"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - Breaking from a selection construct: S is a selection construct, S is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="885"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the innermost structured</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="886"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   control-flow construct containing A, and B is the merge block for S</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="887"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - Breaking from the innermost loop: S is the innermost loop construct</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="888"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// containing A,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="889"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   and B is the merge block for S</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="890"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>-&gt;Merge == Dst)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="891"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="892"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="893"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Entering the innermost loops continue construct: S is the innermost</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="894"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loop construct containing A, and B is the continue target for S</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="895"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>-&gt;Continue == Dst)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="896"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="897"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="898"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: what about cases branching to another case in the switch? Seems</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="899"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to work, but need to double check.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="900"><span class="doxyHighlight">      HasBadEdge = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="901"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="902"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="905"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="906"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Create a single exit node gathering all exit edges.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="907"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;NewExit = S.createSingleExitNode(<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>-&gt;Header, Edges);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="908"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="909"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Fixup this construct&#39;s merge node to point to the new exit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="910"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note: this algorithm fixes inner-most divergence construct first. So</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="911"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// recursive structures sharing a single merge node are fixed from the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="912"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inside toward the outside.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="913"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MergeInstructions = getMergeInstructions(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>-&gt;Header);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="915"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = MergeInstructions&#91;0&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="916"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/blockaddress">BlockAddress</a> &#42;BA = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;BlockAddress&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getOperand(0));</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="920"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="921"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="922"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Clean up of the possible dangling BockAddr operands to prevent MIR</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="923"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// comments about &quot;address of removed block taken&quot;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="924"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!BA-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant/#ac63a8c5280ada17077a6aa14363348b3">isConstantUsed</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="925"><span class="doxyHighlight">      BA-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant/#ae1a4c619a44ea59a2cdeeb85060f385d">destroyConstant</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="927"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>-&gt;Merge = NewExit;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="928"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Regenerate the dom trees.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="929"><span class="doxyHighlight">    S.invalidate();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="930"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="933"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> splitCriticalEdges(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="934"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo">LoopInfo</a> &amp;LI = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/pass/#a4863e5e463fb79955269fbf7fbf52b80">getAnalysis&lt;LoopInfoWrapperPass&gt;</a>().getLoopInfo();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="935"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Splitter S(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>, LI);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="937"><span class="doxyHighlight">    DivergentConstruct Root;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="939"><span class="doxyHighlight">    constructDivergentConstruct(Visited, S, &amp;&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>.begin(), &amp;Root);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="940"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> fixupConstruct(S, &amp;Root);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="941"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="942"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="943"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Simplify branches when possible:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="944"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  - if the 2 sides of a conditional branch are the same, transforms it to an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="945"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  unconditional branch.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="946"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  - if a switch has only 2 distinct successors, converts it to a conditional</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1135" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spirvstructurizer/#aa67ff3b67e1d9aa42109d878ebe23e5a"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spirvstructurizer/#aa67ff3b67e1d9aa42109d878ebe23e5a">runOnFunction</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> override </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1136"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopdeletion-cpp/#a0f1c83c3d08d80b12c424962a5e94ce8a35e0c8c0b180c95d4e122e55ed62cc64">Modified</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1137"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1138"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In LLVM, Switches are allowed to have several cases branching to the same</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1139"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// basic block. This is allowed in SPIR-V, but can make structurizing SPIR-V</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1140"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// harder, so first remove edge cases.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1141"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopdeletion-cpp/#a0f1c83c3d08d80b12c424962a5e94ce8a35e0c8c0b180c95d4e122e55ed62cc64">Modified</a> |= splitSwitchCases(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1142"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1143"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LLVM allows conditional branches to have both side jumping to the same</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1144"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// block. It also allows switched to have a single default, or just one</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1145"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// case. Cleaning this up now.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1146"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopdeletion-cpp/#a0f1c83c3d08d80b12c424962a5e94ce8a35e0c8c0b180c95d4e122e55ed62cc64">Modified</a> |= simplifyBranches(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1147"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1148"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// At this state, we should have a reducible CFG with cycles.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1149"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// STEP 1: Adding OpLoopMerge instructions to loop headers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1150"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopdeletion-cpp/#a0f1c83c3d08d80b12c424962a5e94ce8a35e0c8c0b180c95d4e122e55ed62cc64">Modified</a> |= addMergeForLoops(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1151"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1152"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// STEP 2: adding OpSelectionMerge to each node with an in-degree &gt;= 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1153"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopdeletion-cpp/#a0f1c83c3d08d80b12c424962a5e94ce8a35e0c8c0b180c95d4e122e55ed62cc64">Modified</a> |= addMergeForNodesWithMultiplePredecessors(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1154"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1155"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// STEP 3:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1156"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Sort selection merge, the largest construct goes first.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1157"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This simplifies the next step.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1158"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopdeletion-cpp/#a0f1c83c3d08d80b12c424962a5e94ce8a35e0c8c0b180c95d4e122e55ed62cc64">Modified</a> |= sortSelectionMergeHeaders(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1159"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1160"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// STEP 4: As this stage, we can have a single basic block with multiple</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1161"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// OpLoopMerge/OpSelectionMerge instructions. Splitting this block so each</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1162"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// BB has a single merge instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1163"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopdeletion-cpp/#a0f1c83c3d08d80b12c424962a5e94ce8a35e0c8c0b180c95d4e122e55ed62cc64">Modified</a> |= splitBlocksWithMultipleHeaders(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1164"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1165"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// STEP 5: In the previous steps, we added merge blocks the loops and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1166"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// natural merge blocks (in-degree &gt;= 2). What remains are conditions with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1167"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// an exiting branch (return, unreachable). In such case, we must start from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1168"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the header, and add headers to divergent construct with no headers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1169"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopdeletion-cpp/#a0f1c83c3d08d80b12c424962a5e94ce8a35e0c8c0b180c95d4e122e55ed62cc64">Modified</a> |= addMergeForDivergentBlocks(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1170"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1171"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// STEP 6: At this stage, we have several divergent construct defines by a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1172"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// header and a merge block. But their boundaries have no constraints: a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1173"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// construct exit could be outside of the parents&#39; construct exit. Such</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1174"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// edges are called critical edges. What we need is to split those edges</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1175"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// into several parts. Each part exiting the parent&#39;s construct by its merge</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1176"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1177"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopdeletion-cpp/#a0f1c83c3d08d80b12c424962a5e94ce8a35e0c8c0b180c95d4e122e55ed62cc64">Modified</a> |= splitCriticalEdges(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1178"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1179"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// STEP 7: The previous steps possibly created a lot of &quot;proxy&quot; blocks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1180"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Blocks with a single unconditional branch, used to create a valid</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1181"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// divergent construct tree. Some nodes are still requires (e.g: nodes</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1182"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// allowing a valid exit through the parent&#39;s merge block). But some are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1183"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// left-overs of past transformations, and could cause actual validation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1184"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// issues. E.g: the SPIR-V spec allows a construct to break to the parents</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1185"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loop construct without an OpSelectionMerge, but this requires a straight</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1186"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// jump. If a proxy block lies between the conditional branch and the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1187"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// parent&#39;s merge, the CFG is not valid.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1188"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopdeletion-cpp/#a0f1c83c3d08d80b12c424962a5e94ce8a35e0c8c0b180c95d4e122e55ed62cc64">Modified</a> |= removeUselessBlocks(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1189"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1190"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// STEP 8: Final fix-up steps: our tree boundaries are correct, but some</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1191"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// blocks are branching with no header. Those are often simple conditional</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1192"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// branches with 1 or 2 returning edges. Adding a header for those.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1193"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopdeletion-cpp/#a0f1c83c3d08d80b12c424962a5e94ce8a35e0c8c0b180c95d4e122e55ed62cc64">Modified</a> |= addHeaderToRemainingDivergentDAG(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1194"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1195"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// STEP 9: sort basic blocks to match both the LLVM &amp; SPIR-V requirements.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1196"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopdeletion-cpp/#a0f1c83c3d08d80b12c424962a5e94ce8a35e0c8c0b180c95d4e122e55ed62cc64">Modified</a> |= <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3e4870aac193f722693ae7e24aa5a2be">sortBlocks</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1197"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1198"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopdeletion-cpp/#a0f1c83c3d08d80b12c424962a5e94ce8a35e0c8c0b180c95d4e122e55ed62cc64">Modified</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1199"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1200"></CodeLine>
